attributes.name: Unblemish Refining Acne Wash
attributes.romanceCopy: Wash away breakouts. This gentle cleanser for acne-prone skin unclogs pores + clears blemishes while nourishing skin for a clearer, brighter complexion.
attributes.shortCopy: Wash away breakouts with a cleanser that gently exfoliates and clarifies pores.

attributes.name: Unblemish Clarifying Toner
attributes.romanceCopy: Let your pores breathe. This toner for acne-prone skin uses mild Alpha-Hydroxy Acids to help unclog pores while brightening, soothing + firming skin.
attributes.shortCopy: Give pores breathing room. Mild Alpha-Hydroxy Acids help unclog pores + firm skin.

attributes.name: Unblemish Dual Intensive Acne Treatment
attributes.romanceCopy: Give acne the 1-2 punch. This dual-chamber system delivers 2.5% Benzoyl Peroxide into your pores to help clear + prevent blemishes while hydrating + visibly plumping.
attributes.shortCopy: Bye-bye blemishes. This dual-chamber system helps clear, soothe + visibly plump skin.

attributes.name: Unblemish Invisible Matte Defense Broad Spectrum SPF 30
attributes.romanceCopy: Prime + protect. Our invisible SPF feels like a makeup primer with a smooth, dry finish as it helps control shine+ defend against harmful UV rays.
attributes.shortCopy: Prime + protect. Our clear formula goes is matte like a primer + protects from UV rays.

howToUse.headerText: We designed our Regimens as easy to use systems

steps.label: Cleanse
steps.usage: Wet skin and gently massage evenly over face, avoiding the eye area. Rinse well + pat dry.

steps.label: Treat
steps.usage: Apply evenly to face until it blends into skin, avoiding the eye area. Do not rinse. Reapply throughout the day as needed.

steps.label: Hydrate
steps.usage: Apply evenly over face, avoiding the eye area.

steps.label: Protect
steps.usage: Shake well before use. Apply over face + neck, avoiding the eye area.

attributes.name: Soothe + Total RF Serum Special
attributes.romanceCopy: Revitalize and relieve your skin! Total RF Serum pairs with calming Soothe Regimen for renewed and energized skin.

itemized.name: Colloidal Oatmeal
itemized.copy: Helps relieve dry, itchy, eczema-prone skin

itemized.name: Artichoke Leaf Extract + Patented RF3 Antioxidant Complex

attributes.name: Soothe Calming Gel Cleanser
attributes.romanceCopy: Wash away irritation. Our daily face cleanser for sensitive skin melts away makeup + impurities without disrupting pH balance.
attributes.shortCopy: Protects and provides relief for chapped, cracked or dry skin.

attributes.name: Soothe Sensitive Skin Treatment
attributes.romanceCopy: Relieve + relax. Infused with nourishing RFp2 Peptide Complex, this dry skin treatment instantly reduces visible redness as it protects + hydrates.
attributes.shortCopy: Locks in hydration and helps strengthen skin’s natural moisture barrier.

attributes.name: Soothe Moisturizing Rescue Cream
attributes.romanceCopy: Major moisture. A blend of Colloidal Oatmeal + Ceramides seals in hydration and strengthens skin’s natural moisture barrier for soft, supple, moisturized-looking skin.

attributes.name: Soothe Daily Mineral Sunscreen SPF 30
attributes.romanceCopy: Protect + soothe. Our 100% mineral-based sunscreen for face defends skin from everyday environmental aggressors that can cause irritation.
attributes.shortCopy: Defends skin from environmental aggressors while minimizing visible redness.

attributes.name: Reverse Regimen
attributes.romanceCopy: Bright + beautiful. Brightening ingredients like Salicylic Acid, Vitamin C and Retinol refine skin’s surface + tackle the look of fine lines + dark spots.

attributes.name: Reverse + Total RF Serum Special
attributes.romanceCopy: Revitalize + brighten! Total RF Serum + Reverse Regimen have been clinically tested to work together for brighter, more radiant, glowing skin.

ingredients.label: Proprietary Technology + Key Ingredients
ingredients.fullList:
Reverse Deep Exfoliating Cleanser
Water/Aqua/Eau, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Diethylhexyl Sebacate, Polylactic Acid, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Jojoba Esters, PEG-40 Stearate, Ammonium Laureth Sulfate, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Pentylene Glycol, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Ceteareth-20, Hydroxyacetophenone, Glycolic Acid, Lactic Acid, Fragrance/Parfum, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Citric Acid, Sodium Magnesium Silicate, C10-16 Pareth-1, Xanthan Gum, Butylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Yellow 6 (CI 15985), Limonene, Linalool.
Reverse Intensive Brightening Toner
Water/Aqua/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Bis-PEG-12 Dimethicone, Trideceth-9, Glycerin, Polysorbate 20, PEG-5 Isononanoate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Panthenol, Caprylyl Glycol, Bisabolol, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Passiflora Edulis Fruit Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Fruit Extract, Fragrance/Parfum, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Silica, Alcohol Denat., Phenylethyl Resorcinol, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Bisulfite, Sodium Hydroxide, Trehalose, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Limonene, Linalool.
Reverse Brightening Defense Fluid Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF 50
ACTIVE INGREDIENTS (W/W): Avobenzone 2.8%, Homosalate 9.3%, Octisalate 4.67%, Octocrylene 6.1%
INACTIVE INGREDIENTS: Adenosine, Aminomethyl Propanol, Aqua/Eau/Water, Benzyl Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Calcium Gluconate, Citral, Citric Acid, Cynara Scolymus (Artichoke) Leaf Extract, Dimethicone, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, DipotassiumGlycyrrhizate, Fragrance/Parfum, Gluconolactone, Glycerin, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Limonene, Linalool, Methyl Carboxymethylphenyl Aminocarboxypropylphosphonate, Phenoxyethanol, Propanediol, Rosmarinic Acid, Rutin, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Extract, Silica, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Carbomer, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Tocopherol, Xanthan Gum.
Reverse Tone Correcting Treatment
Dimethicone, Propanediol, Isododecane, Glycerin, Ascorbic Acid, Pentylene Glycol, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Ascorbyl Glucoside, PEG/PPG-18/18 Dimethicone, Ethoxydiglycol, Kojic Acid, Polysilicone-11, Retinal, Retinyl Palmitate, Hydroxyapatite, Fragrance/Parfum, Tocopherol, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Citral, Limonene, Linalool.

itemized.name: Retinoid Technology
itemized.copy: Revitalizes skin + prompts surface cell turnover

itemized.name: Patented RF3 Antioxidant Complex
itemized.copy: Fortifies skin to be more resilient and defensive against environmental aggressors

attributes.name: Reverse Deep Exfoliating Cleanser
attributes.romanceCopy: Wash away imperfections. Our exfoliating cleanser utilizes powerful exfoliators like glycolic and lactic acid to refine uneven skin texture.
attributes.shortCopy: Exfoliate away uneven tone + brighten dark spots with glycolic + lactic acids.

attributes.name: Reverse Intensive Brightening Toner
attributes.romanceCopy: Rev up your radiance. Our skin-brightening toner improves the look of dark spots, discoloration + uneven tone for a younger-looking complexion.
attributes.shortCopy: Visibly minimize discoloration while brightening skin and boosting radiance

attributes.name: Reverse Brightening Defense Fluid Lotion SPF 50
attributes.romanceCopy: Delay discoloration. Our hydrating sunscreen lotion for face enhances skin’s resilience to environmental triggers that lead to discoloration.
attributes.shortCopy: Prevent the formation of dark marks + protect skin from UV rays.

attributes.name: Reverse Tone Correcting Treatment
attributes.romanceCopy: Wake up to radiance. Our proprietary nighttime complex combines Vitamin C, Retinoids + Kojic Acid to visibly even skin tone + fade away dark spots.
attributes.shortCopy: Potent skin discoloration treatment for a brighter, more radiant complexion.

attributes.name: Spotless Regimen
attributes.romanceCopy: Give acne the 1-2 punch! Our skincare routine for teenage acne clears existing blemishes + prevents new breakouts with breakthrough BPO2 Technology.

howToUse.headerText: We designed our Regimens as easy to use systems.

steps.label: Cleanse
steps.usage: Using fingertips, apply a thin layer and massage over face for 90 seconds.

steps.label: Treat
steps.usage:
Dispense 1-2 pumps into palm and blend evenly.
Cover affected area with a thin layer of product.
Do not rinse off.

attributes.name: Spotless Power Up Special
attributes.romanceCopy: Results on Day 1! Our SPOTLESS Regimen + Pore Cleansing MD System pair up to deliver acne-fighting BPO2 Technology deep into pores after removing excess oil + blackheads.

itemized.name: Benzoyl Peroxide 5%
itemized.copy: Penetrates pores to eliminate teen and young adult acne before it starts

itemized.name: BPO2 Technology
itemized.copy: Delivers more oxygen and Benzoyl Peroxide to the pores, killing acne-causing bacteria on Day 1 of treatment

attributes.name: Spotless Daily Acne Wash
attributes.romanceCopy: Wash away breakouts. Our acne wash with 5% Benzoyl Peroxide gently exfoliates for a refreshing deep clean + helps stop breakouts before they form.
attributes.typicalUse: Twice daily, in the AM + PM

attributes.name: Spotless Acne Clearing Treatment
attributes.romanceCopy: Stop acne at its source. Our dual-chamber system combines 2.5% Benzoyl Peroxide with boosting gel to clear skin + prevent future breakouts.
attributes.typicalUse: Twice daily, in the AM + PM
